flawed_nl_solution:
The sum of the weights of the 5 girls is 45 kg x 5 = <<45*5=225>>225 kg.
The sum of the weights of the 5 boys is 55 kg x 5 = <<55*5=725>>725 kg.
The sum of the weights of the ten students is 225 kg + 725 kg = <<225+725=950>>950 kg.
Hence, the average weight of those 10 students is 950 kg/10 = <<950/10=95>>95 kg.
#### 95

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 275, not 725. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
